text: Michael "Mike" Carroll (born 10 September 1952) is a Scottish professional footballer who played as a forward. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Aberdeen Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liverpool F.C. players Category:Grimsby Town F.C. players Category:Louth United F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: Mike Carroll (footballer)
